data.neighbors.hubness.util

Class FrequentNeighborPairsFinder

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.neighbors.hubness.util.FrequentNeighborPairsFinder

  • public class FrequentNeighborPairsFinder
extends java.lang.Object
    This utility script extracts the most frequent neighbor pairs in the given dataset for the specified neighborhood size and the specified metric.

      • outputTopNeighborPairs

        public static void outputTopNeighborPairs(java.lang.String inFilePath,
                          java.io.File outFile,
                          CombinedMetric cmet,
                          int k)
                                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Calculate and write a list of most frequent co-occurring neighbor pairs.
        Parameters:
        inFilePath - String that is the input file path.
        outFile - Output file.
        cmet - CombinedMetric object for distance calculations.
        k - Integer that is the neighborhood size.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
